properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 6:52PM CST by NWS Green Bay WI
properties.description:
Light to moderate snow and blowing snow will lead to snow covered
and slippery roads this evening, especially on untreated
surfaces. The worst conditions will be south and east of a line
from Chilton to Kewaunee. The snow is expected to taper off late
tonight, however roads and sidewalks may continue to be slippery.
Gusty northerly winds of 20 to 30 mph will lead to blowing and
drifting snow, with reduced visibilities at times, especially
along west to east oriented roadways.

Please allow extra time to reach your destination if traveling
tonight and be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions.

NWSheadline: SLIPPERY TRAVEL CONDITIONS EXPECTED THIS EVENING
